kv2.8:5.3: Nanu atthi sukhā vedanā, kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ, dibbaṃ sukhaṃ, mānusakaṃ sukhaṃ, lābhasukhaṃ, sakkārasukhaṃ, yānasukhaṃ, sayanasukhaṃ, issariyasukhaṃ, ādhipaccasukhaṃ, gihisukhaṃ, sāmaññasukhaṃ, sāsavaṃ sukhaṃ, anāsavaṃ sukhaṃ, upadhisukhaṃ, nirūpadhisukhaṃ, sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ, nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ, sappītikaṃ sukhaṃ, nippītikaṃ sukhaṃ, jhānasukhaṃ, vimuttisukhaṃ, kāmasukhaṃ, nekkhammasukhaṃ, vivekasukhaṃ, upasamasukhaṃ, sambodhasukhanti?
kv2.8:5.7: sambodhasukhaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.8:6.3: Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā vedanā kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassaupāyāsāti?
kv2.8:7.7: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, cakkhusamphasso āditto;
kv2.8:7.8: yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi ādittaṃ.
kv2.8:7.10: ‘Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmi.
kv2.8:7.19: mano āditto, dhammā ādittā, manoviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, manosamphasso āditto;
kv2.8:7.20: yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi ādittaṃ.
kv2.8:7.22: ‘Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmī”ti.
kv2.8:8.6: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
kv2.8:8.10: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
kv2.8:9.5: “lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāya.
kv2.8:9.6: Diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, cha phassāyatanikā nāma nirayā.
kv2.8:9.7: Tattha yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, aniṭṭharūpaññeva passati no iṭṭharūpaṃ, akantarūpaññeva passati no kantarūpaṃ, amanāparūpaññeva passati no manāparūpaṃ.
kv2.8:9.8: Yaṃ kiñci sotena saddaṃ suṇāti … pe …
kv2.8:9.13: manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti, aniṭṭharūpaññeva vijānāti no iṭṭharūpaṃ, akantarūpaññeva vijānāti no kantarūpaṃ, amanāparūpaññeva vijānāti no manāparūpan”ti.
kv2.8:10.4: “lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāya.
kv2.8:10.5: Diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, cha phassāyatanikā nāma saggā.
kv2.8:10.6: Tattha yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, iṭṭharūpaññeva passati no aniṭṭharūpaṃ, kantarūpaññeva passati no akantarūpaṃ, manāparūpaññeva passati no amanāparūpaṃ.
kv2.8:10.7: Yaṃ kiñci sotena saddaṃ suṇāti … pe …
kv2.8:10.12: manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti, iṭṭharūpaññeva vijānāti no aniṭṭharūpaṃ, kantarūpaññeva vijānāti no akantarūpaṃ, manāparūpaññeva vijānāti no amanāparūpan”ti.
kv2.8:11.8: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.8:12.3: Dānaṃ aniṭṭhaphalaṃ akantaphalaṃ amanuññaphalaṃ secanakaphalaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākanti?
kv2.8:13.7: brahmacariyaṃ aniṭṭhaphalaṃ akantaphalaṃ amanuññaphalaṃ secanakaphalaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākanti?
kv2.8:14.1: Nanu dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv2.8:14.3: Hañci dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.8:15.4: brahmacariyaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv2.8:15.6: Hañci brahmacariyaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
